rules_text: Whenever a nontoken Warlock you control deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 blue and black Warlock creature token with “When this creature dies, surveil 1” [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Even the furthest far gone warlocks cannot corrupt humanity's most pure. [/i]
